name: Coccolithogenesis
description:
A micro love story 💕

Individuals meet on a micro scale. They first observe each other at a distance. Take turns exposing themselves and their vulnerabilities. Maybe mutual interest is sparked. Will they unite and reproduce 💕? Or will it end in heartbreak 💔 and tears?

How to play:

Mouse/touch controls. Click, click/drag.

  • Gently help a critter to open up
  • When a critter opens up, look for other critters responding
  • Help responding critter open up too
  • When two critters have exposed their core, and mutual interest is sparked they'll try to make a connection
  • Keep critters open, and keep others out of the way
Team:
  • Marc Florentinus Hansen: Code/Design
  • Mikkel Jensby: Sound/Design
  • Dennis Klyver: Code/Design
  • Peter Holm: Graphics/Design

Made during Nordic Game Jam 2023. Theme prompt: Coccolithophores + Specific heat capacity + Heartbreak
